attributes.action: Leave the ECHR and Take Back Control of Britain’s Borders.
attributes.additional_details: The British people are being ignored while illegal migrants are rewarded with comfort and protection. Our laws are overruled by foreign judges. This is a betrayal of national sovereignty. Leaving the ECHR is the first step in reclaiming control, restoring justice, and defending our future.
attributes.background: Withdraw the UK from the ECHR to restore full sovereign control over our borders. End the legal loopholes that prevent deportation of illegal migrants. Stop housing them in hotels at public expense. Prioritise British citizens. Enforce our laws without foreign interference.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Hold a referendum to decide if the UK should leave the ECHR.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700614

Shut the migrant hotels down now and deport illegal migrants housed there
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/718406
